title: Ecofriendly Sun Care Brand VitaSea Launches E-Commerce Website with Five Sustainable Products for Sensitive Skin - PR Newswire
summary: VitaSea, a new sun care brand founded by the creator of Noodle & Boo, is launching a line of sustainable and biodegradable sunscreens. These products are formulated with natural ingredients like sea kelp and vitamins E and C, are hypoallergenic and reef-safe, and come in various forms like lotions, sprays, and sticks. The company is committed to environmental conservation and donates a portion of its profits to organizations working to combat climate change.

title: Ready-To-Drink Beverage Start-Up Salud Plans Foray Into 10 Indian Markets - Outlook Startup
summary: Salud Beverages, an Indian alco-bev brand, is expanding its presence in 10 new markets and launching new spirit-based RTD products. The company is prioritizing sustainable packaging with recyclable cans and has established a distillery in Goa. Salud's focus on local sourcing, innovative product offerings, and a commitment to environmental responsibility through sustainable packaging positions them for continued success in India's growing alco-bev market.

title: Diageo India Introduces Godawan Century, a Limited-Edition Artisanal Single Malt, Celebrating the Great Indian Bustard - PR Newswire
summary: Diageo India, a leading beverage alcohol company, has launched a limited-edition single malt whiskey, Godawan Century, which celebrates the Great Indian Bustard (Godawan), an endangered bird species. The product is made with sustainable practices, including using old, discarded casks for the packaging and promoting environmental conservation efforts. The company aims to create mindful luxury and promote responsible consumption through this initiative.

title: Founders of Lifelong Online Retail Acquire Majority Ownership and Control, Expanding Focus on Indian Market - Indian Retailer
summary: Juicy Chemistry and Mommy Shots by Amrita have partnered for the 'Scars are Beautiful' campaign, celebrating the beauty of postpartum bodies and stretch marks. The campaign seeks to promote self-love and body positivity by celebrating the unique journey of motherhood.

title: Top 10 Best Food & Beverages Companies In India In 2023 - Inventiva
summary: India's food and beverage industry is booming in 2023, driven by a growing population, increasing disposable income, and a shift towards processed and convenient foods. Top companies in the sector, like Amul, Nestle India, Hindustan Unilever, and PepsiCo India, are capitalizing on these trends by introducing new products, expanding their offerings, and focusing on innovation and sustainability.
